snippet: A 19-year-old Ohio man serving life in prison for killing three students in a high school cafeteria in 2012 briefly escaped from prison on Thursday, the authorities said.
abstract: Ohio authorities say T J Lane, 19-year-old Ohio man serving life in prison for killing three students in a high school cafeteria in 2012, briefly escaped from prison before being recaptured.
lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old Ohio man serving life in prison for killing three students in a high school cafeteria in 2012 briefly escaped from prison on Thursday, the authorities said.

headline.main: T.J. Lane, Killer in School Shooting, Is Caught After Prison Escape in Ohio
headline.print_headline: Killer in School Shooting of 3 Escapes Prison in Ohio
